title: 01/28/21 DPS Best OF
itunes:title: 01/28/21 DPS Best OF
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP discusses the Texans hiring David Culley as their new Head Coach. Can the move persuade Deshaun Watson to stay? We aired an interview that we recorded with Patrick Mahomes after the show yesterday. He discusses which NBA Player he wanted to be when he was younger and why his OC Eric Bieniemy has yet to land a head coaching gig. We're also joined by Titans Running Back Derrick Henry, who recounts being too nervous to introduce himself to Kobe Bryant a couple years ago.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP discusses the Texans hiring David Culley as their new Head Coach. Can the move persuade Deshaun Watson to stay? We aired an interview that we recorded with Patrick Mahomes after the show yesterday. He discusses which NBA Player he wanted to be when he was younger and why his OC Eric Bieniemy has yet to land a head coaching gig. We're also joined by Titans Running Back Derrick Henry, who recounts being too nervous to introduce himself to Kobe Bryant a couple years ago.
